about_the_game:
STRTK1NG is interactive driving game offering an infinite combination of racing opportunities.
Each vehicle in STRTK1NG is unique and created to offer a different perspective with attention performance.
This project is an individual effort that is undergoing development with no obligations to a publisher or any external entity, with the user and community being our only priority.
Why pick STRTK1NG as a game?

As an open world car simulator, STRTK1NG currently covers a limited range of opportunities - everything The vehicle customization offers you the way to make your car all your own matching different aspects of your style.
The main purpose of this current build is to know what players would like to do in game, be it the introduction of various challengers as well as overall performance on a large scale in order to identify the scope of the genre as whole.


This game currently offers you:
• Exciting race modes. Circuit ,Sprint, Bounty Mode,Lap Knock Out,Speed Trap
• 30+ cars
• 50 races
• 7 modes :- Circuit , Sprint, Lap K.O. Time Trial , Bounty,Speed Traps
• Many Customization options & Decals (Rims, Spoilers, Flags* & Vinyl) *Represent your country.
• Interactive Paint Spectrum –Make your own unique scheme.

This current build of the game doesn’t have:
• Helicopters
• Explosions


Wanna know the specifics?
The game play of STRTK1NG is pretty intuitive. You start with a set of cars in your garage that you can race in Stark City. Placing first is rewarded with cash. The amount of cash you get depends on what mode you choose and current performance. Get enough cash to upgrade your vehicle and avoid getting caught by the police.

The driving feel is meant to feel authentic and instinctive, with movement and handling at times realistic and violent.

STRTK1NG is inspired by amazing games like:
• Need for Speed: Most Wanted (2005)
• Grand Theft Auto: V
• Burnout Revenge
A quick note from the developer:
Please don't hesitate to contact me if you have feedback, questions, or problems with the game. I’ll do our best to get back to you as quickly as possible and provide support if needed. Also let me know if you enjoyed the game, because that makes my day!

legal_notice: STRTK1NG - Developed by Rogue Laboratory Studio. Manufacturers, cars, names, brands and associated imagery featured in this game in some cases include trademarks and/or copyrighted materials of Rogue Laboratory Studio.
name: STRTK1NG

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1650 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: AMD RYZEN 7 5800
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Two Rules:Don't be last & Don't get caught. StrtK1ng is a racing game offering new modes and variations reminiscent of pre-existing games
